sub2cards

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • sub2cards.Word

  • public class Word
extends Object
    handles a collected word from a subtitle file. This class should be able to retrieve the original morphological form of the word and its translation

      • simplify

        public static String simplify(String originalWord,
                              String encoding)
                       throws Exception
        for example, using this function on the word стали, we expect to find сталь which is the "base form" of the word steel in russian.
        Parameters:
        originalWord - the word to simplify
        encoding - if a special encoding is needed
        Returns:
        the simplified form of the word or the word itself
        Throws:
        Exception - in case the service used didn't know the word

      • simplify

        public static String simplify(String word)
                       throws Exception
        for example, using this function on the word стали, we expect to find сталь which is the "base form" of the word steel in russian.

        Default encoding is UTF-8

        Parameters:
        word - the word to simplify
        Returns:
        the simplified form of the word or the word itself
        Throws:
        Exception - in case the service used didn't know the word

        regex - pattern to match
        Returns:

      • simplifyParallel

        public static List<Word> simplifyParallel(List<Word> words,
                                          int factor)
        Parameters:
        words - a given collection of words to simplify
        factor - multiple used on the number of available processors. Used to compute the number of threads.
        Returns:
        a new list of Word instances, with translation field updated
